0.1.name: wordpress/wp-footer-ad
0.1.description:
Wp Footer Ad adds a banner in the footer of your blog. All users who visit your blog will see a clickable banner at the bottom of their browser.

It 'a really useful plugin to advertise your products or services, affiliate links, etc.. For WP Footer always manages to attract the attention of your users.

-See Video Demo at WP Footer Ad Homepage -My website: Web Marketing
